Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: rubrobles
Reviews.Content: This product is cheap in construction, the sleeve does not hold to cable. When used with RG59 cable. Don't buy , order to many and cost to much to ship back

Reviews.Title: Great value - worked great on my video job
Reviews.Author: Tool User
Reviews.Content: I used these for wiring up some cameras and they worked great. made from decent quality and great price!other packs were more expensive.I highly recommend this option to the compression adapters which don't stay on well and are hard to make a good connection with.

Reviews.Title: BNC Connectors
Reviews.Author: carol abruzzese
Reviews.Content: These connectors serve their purpose.  They are of great quality and look exactly as they are pictured.  They are for use with video Co-ax cable.

ProductInfo.Features:
Quantity: 100
For use with RG59 Coax Cable
Male Crimp-on Connector
BNC Type
RG59/6 Crimping Tool is required
ProductInfo.Name: Professional RG59/BNC Male Crimp-On Connector, 2 piece set (100pcs)
